{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amazon |model=Dash Wand |revision=2 Gen (PL46MN) |upc=841667167534 |asin=B01MQMJFDK,B015YEXOR2, |price=20 |fcc_date=09/14/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=IoT, barcode scanner, |fcc_id=2AETI-0610 |pwr_v=3 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=battery powered |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=ATSAMG55J19A-MU |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q128A |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=ATWINC1500B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=PCB on-board |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 Chip;Cypress;CYBL10563;CYBL10563-68FNXI;1; ,,, Audio Chip;Wolfram Microelectronics;WM8904;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 LE, Alexa support |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=50:F5:DA,68:54:FD }} {{TagLine|Amazon Dash Wand (with Alexa)}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.amzn.com/B01MQMJFDK}}
<small>This is the second generation of the ''Amazon Dash Wand'' which appears to have been :re-released as the ''Amazon Dash Wand with Alexa'' to emphasize Alexa support.</small>
Chip IDs are hidden in FCC photos.
*[https://mpetroff.net/2016/12/second-generation-amazon-dash-wand-teardown ''Second Generation Amazon Dash (Wand) Teardown'' from '''Matthew Petroff''']
